phyi
tsha
103
mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i
'od 'bar

mtshan nyid la gsum las ¦
rtog pas btags pa dgag pa ni | nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang gnyen po gzhi shes kyi mtshan nyid se 'bre"Se" is understood to refer to be the author's teacher dge bshes Se dmar ba (ID:3886), but it could also be Jo bo Se btsun (ID:6763). "'Bre" is understodd to refer to 'Bre shes rab 'bar (ID:3807) but could also refer to gTsang pa 'bre sgur (ID:3872). Stoltz argues in favor of the former (Stoltz 2022 [4LWBNM7B]: 121) gzhi thams cad gang zag gi bdag med dang | gang zag gi bdag dang gzung ba rang bzhin med
pa tsam dang bdag mtha' dag skye ba med par mngon sum du rtogs pa'o zhes so |
kha 1 gnyal nyan rang la chos kyi bdag med rtogs pa yod pas de mi rigs so zhes so ||
kha 1 'dul skye med gsum bsdus nas sgom pa la rtogs pa lhun grub thob nas dkar chos rim can du sgom pa zhes pa ni rnam kun bkag pa de nyid kyis khegs so |
las | rtog pas btags pa dgag pa ni kha cig 'bre brtan pa thob pa'i sgom pa'o zhes so |

kha cig rtsang 'bre chos sku thob pa'i don du brtan pa thob pa'i sgom pa'o zhes grag go |
de mi 'thad de sa 'og ma dag na dran pa nyer bzhag la brtan pa thob pa yod pas de yod par thal lo ||
'bum pa gsung lo |
kha 1tho ston spyi'i mtshan nyid bden bzhi de kho na nyid sngar ma mthong ba mthong ba'o || zhes so|

las | rtog pas btags pa dgag pa ni kha 1 khu 'brom"Khu" is understood to refer to Khu ston brTson 'grus g.yung drung (ID:4235), but could also be Khu mDo sde 'bar (ID:3873)'. chos bzod dang chos shes ma dag pa dang dag pa rtogs par bzhag ste ma dag pa chos mchog man chad las khad nye ba dang ring bas zhes so |
kha 1 rgya gnyanThe identification of "gnyan" as g.Yor gnyan (ID:3837) is tentative. mthong lam dang mthong spang skye 'gag byed bzhin pa dang des
dben pas so zhes smra'o | kha cig karThe identification of "kar" as 'Dul 'dzin dkar mo (ID:3820) is tentative. rgyud sgom spang dang mthong spang gis ma dag pa dang dag pas so zhes grag go |

kha 1 khu chos bzod chos shes gnyis ni mthong spang rgyun gcod pa dang thag sring pa'i bar chad med pa dang rnam grol gyi lam gnyis su skye la | rjes bzod rjes shes ni gnyis kar 'du ste | 'di ltar chos bzod kyis chos nyid ma dag pa mthong ba na de 'jal gyi ye shes de nyid kyi gzhan
rig gi chos nyid rtogs pa dang | rang rig gi cha'i chos nyid rtogs pa la rjes bzod rjes shes su 'jog go || chos shes kyis chos nyid dag pa mthong ba na ye shes de nyid kyis gzhan rig dang rang rig gi cha'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i cha nas rjes bzod rjes shes su 'jog go |de ltar yang bzod pa dang shes pa thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can du rig par bya'o zhes chos nyid kyi yul can kho nar bshad pas shes so zhes grag go |

'ban mnyam gzhag skad cig gcig tu skye ste| bsdu ba las 'bras bu'i mngon par rtogs pa skad cig ma yin la zhes pa dang | don dam pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbang
du bya ste skad cig ma gcig yin la zhes bshad pas so |

su ka ta na re sa brgyad pa la'o || 'brom na re sa bcu pa sangs rgyas kyi sa yin
pas dgu pa la'o || khyung po dang dha na re sa bcu pa'i dkyil stod la yin te byang chub sems dpa'i mngon rtogs yin pa'i phyir ro |
kha cigrtsang 'bre mkhyen gsuM gyi spyi la bstod la der mtshan nyid pa'i gsuM lasogs pa brgyad 'du bas so zhes so |

kir ti'i'bre shes rabni kha cig
mkhyen gsuM rgyu'i dus na sbyor bzhi 'bras bu'i dus na chos sku rgyu 'bras kyis khyad par du ma byas pa rang bzhin yin la lo tsa ba rgya che shos mkhyen gsuM du sbyor bzhi 'du bar 'dod kyis nga ni sbyor ba'i chos sku bsdoms par yang mkhyen gsum 'dus so zhes smra'o ||

kha ciglo tsha ba mkhyen pa gsuM ni dus gsuM car dang 'brel ba rang gzhan thaMd kyi rgyud la thun mong ba 'phags pa'i gang zag thaMd kyi rgyud pa skye ba thos bsam gyi gtan la dbab pa'i yul shes bya rgya mtsho lta bu yin la sbyor bzhi chos sku ni bdag nyid dang 'brel ba'i rgyu
'bras kyi gnas skabs mngon rtogs nyung zas skra rtse'i chu tshod tsam yin pas der ci ste mi 'du zhes gsung ngo |

kha cig ar mkhyen gsum gyi rtogs pa gang rung skyed byed mtshan nyid du bkod pas kyang sangs rgyas skyed byed du mtshon nus so zhes gsung pa mi 'thad de mtshan nyid la ldog pa gsum byung pas mtshon bya la'ang tha dad pas gcig skyed byed mtshan nyid du bzhag pan gnyis po'i mtshon bya la ma khyab pa'i phyir dang nyan rang gi sbyor ba la'ang gzhi shes kyi rtogs pa skyed byed yod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas skyed byed yod par thal lo ||

kha cigar mkhyen gsuM mtshon byed kyi chos sum bcu la mkhyen
gsuM zhes bya la des sbyor ba'i chos sku bsdus so zhes grags so ||
'dul 'dzin zer ro |

kha 1rma bya snang ba la bden par zhen pa dgag bya'i chos yin
te | 'dir ni sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa'i || bden par rtog pa bzlog bya yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro|
kha 1phya pasgrub bya snang ba dang bden pas stong pa tshogs don yin la de dag kyang rim pa ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa yin no|
kha 1gangs pa du ma la gcig yod par 'brel la du ma de gcig yin par 'gal bas skyon 2 ka med do zhes grag go |
kha cig rgya ma 'chi ba'i shes pa chon shes pa phyi ma skyed nges te shes pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro da ltar gyi shes pa'i rtags la brten pa'i rjes dpag gis grub ces zer ro ||
kha 1 ku ma ra tshig las don la tshad ma'i nges pa skyed nas 'jug par 'dod pa ni mi 'thad de| tshig dang don la 'brel ba med pa'i phyir dang | the tshom kho na skyed nas 'jug ces mtshungs pas so |

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces
bya ba'i 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i 'od 'bar zhes bya ba | shes bya'i nam mkha' la blo gros kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing | legs smra'i 'od kyis phas rgol mun pa'i smag rum sel bar byed pa shAkya'i dge slong rigs par
smra ba shes rab 'od zer gyis sbyar ba rdzogs so || × || dag cing snyoms pa shes rab 'bum gyis bris | dge'o || ||
